column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I really enjoy the food at Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba. I've had a good experience dining at this restaurant and ordering online. I dropped by yesterday around noon. We were having about a dozen and a half people over for dinner and I wanted to order some food to pick up later to serve our guests. I sat at the bar and waited for one of the bartenders to take my order. For some reason
column2: there appeared to be some indifference about finding a moment to take the order. And
column4: it wasn't particularly busy. I sat for a while before finally being approached. When I was finally waited on
